TO START LOGGING:
Step 1: Configure System (if needed)
Step 2: Turn On

 TO CONFIGURE:
*** Requires Wifi ***
Settings->Configuration-> Update
 If successful, "Update Complete" will be displayed below "Update"

Raproto: A rapid prototyping platform for the Internet-of-Medical-Things.
 Developed by: The PRECISE Center, University of Pennsylvania 
 Raproto provides data collection, storage, analysis APIs, and feedback mechanisms that can be utilized to prototype various medical devices using inexpensive hardware that is commonly available. 
 For more information about future developments, contact: "James Weimer weimerj@seas.upenn.edu
